info.title: Google Cloud Translation API
info.description: Google Cloud Translation API v3 for text translation (Korean <-> English)

contents.description: The content of the input in string format

source_language_code.description: Source language code (optional, auto-detected if not provided)

initialization.code:
from google.cloud import translate_v3 as translate

client = translate.TranslationServiceClient()
project_id = 'your-project-id'
location = 'global'
parent = f'projects/{project_id}/locations/{location}'

translate_text.example:
response = client.translate_text(
    parent=parent,
    contents=['Hello, how are you?'],
    target_language_code='ko',
    source_language_code='en'
)

for translation in response.translations:
    print(translation.translated_text)

free_tier.notes: First 500,000 characters per month are free (applied as $10 credit)

x-fastapi-integration.service_example:
from google.cloud import translate_v3 as translate
from pydantic import BaseModel

class TranslationService:
    def __init__(self, project_id: str):
        self.client = translate.TranslationServiceClient()
        self.parent = f'projects/{project_id}/locations/global'
    
    async def translate(
        self,
        text: str,
        target_lang: str,
        source_lang: str | None = None
    ) -> str:
        response = self.client.translate_text(
            parent=self.parent,
            contents=[text],
            target_language_code=target_lang,
            source_language_code=source_lang
        )
        return response.translations[0].translated_text
